fxInfo_clarification: By ordinary courts, we mean non-specialized courts. For example, the Supreme Court, Appellate Courts, and District Courts in the United States By contrast, specialized courts include the constitutional court, military courts, and administrative courts.
fxInfo_question: Does the court system provide for any of the following?

fxInfo_responses.value: Supreme court and other courts to be determined by law [e_LEVJUD -2]
Supreme court and specific other courts, such as provincial or city courts [e_LEVJUD -3]
Other courts mentioned, but no supreme court [e_LEVJUD -4]
Other, please specify in the comments section [e_LEVJUD -96]

name: e_ccp_levjud
